JOB DESCRIPTION: Wolfram is seeking a dedicated and skilled Software Developer in Test to work with our Quality Assurance department as a Consultant. This position will entail leading testing and test automation efforts in web products; designing,  implementing and maintaining automation suites; performing manual testing; building internal tools and documentation; and developing and maintaining an understanding of modern testing tools and trends. Wolfram is seeking someone who has experience with manual and automation testing tools as well as experience with programming languages such as Java,  HTML,  CSS and JavaScript. The ideal person will have the ability to work outside the normal business hours in case of an emergency or product releases. You will be collaborating with multiple teams,  so excellent verbal and written communication skills are a must.
